response.original_title: Celebration Of Gospel Taking You Higher
response.overview: Stomp, clap and praise the Lord with this live special celebrating gospel music. Featuring moving performances by renowned gospel and R&B singers Kirk Franklin, Yolanda Adams, Fred Hammond and 'American Idol' finalist Fantasia Barrino, as well as a tribute to entertainment mogul Tyler Perry, this installment of BET's annual concert is sure to have viewers dancing wherever they are, whether it's in the aisles or at home.
response.title: Celebration Of Gospel Taking You Higher
